mapper.select: SELECT NAME, NAME_ENG, CASE WHEN LENGTH(TEL_NO) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,4,4),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,8,4)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,4,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,7,4)) END AS TEL_NO, ADDRESS, DATE_FORMAT(START_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') START_DATE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_KEY = WORKER_TYPE) WORKER_TYPE, STAFF_GRADE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_KEY = STAFF_GRADE) STAFF_GRADE_NAME, (SELECT STORE_NAME FROM STORE WHERE STORE_ID = STAFF_INFO.STORE_ID) STORE_ID, ID_PICTURE_IDX, HEALTH_CERTIFICATE_IDX, RESUME_IDX, REG_DATE, REG_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_ID, STAFF_ID, CASE WHEN STATUS = 'A' THEN '근무' ELSE '퇴근' END AS STATUS, DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') END_DATE FROM STAFF_INFO

SELECT NAME, NAME_ENG, CASE WHEN LENGTH(TEL_NO) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,4,4),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,8,4)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,4,3),'-',SUBSTRING(TEL_NO,7,4)) END AS TEL_NO, ADDRESS, DATE_FORMAT(START_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') START_DATE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_KEY = WORKER_TYPE) WORKER_TYPE, STAFF_GRADE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_KEY = STAFF_GRADE) STAFF_GRADE_NAME, STORE_ID, (SELECT STORE_NAME from STORE where STORE_ID = STAFF_INFO.STORE_ID) STORE_NAME, ID_PICTURE_IDX, HEALTH_CERTIFICATE_IDX, RESUME_IDX, REG_DATE, REG_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_ID, STAFF_ID, CASE WHEN STATUS = 'A' THEN '근무' ELSE '퇴근' END AS STATUS, DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') END_DATE FROM STAFF_INFO WHERE STAFF_ID = #{staffId} AND STORE_ID = #{storeId}

SELECT NS_ID, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_KEY = NATIONALITY) NATIONALITY, NAME, FULL_NAME, TEL_NO, ADDRESS, DATE_FORMAT(START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') START_DATE, (SELECT STORE_NAME FROM STORE WHERE STORE_ID = NS_INSTRUCTOR.STORE_ID) STORE_ID, PICTURE_IDX, CRIMINAL_RECORDS_IDX, RESUME_IDX, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DATE FROM NS_INSTRUCTOR
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STAFF_INFO ( NAME, NAME_ENG, TEL_NO, ADDRESS, START_DATE, WORKER_TYPE, STAFF_GRADE, STORE_ID, ID_PICTURE_IDX, HEALTH_CERTIFICATE_IDX, RESUME_IDX, REG_DATE, REG_ID, STAFF_ID, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{nameEng}, #{telNo}, #{address}, #{startDate}, #{workerType}, #{staffGrade}, #{storeId}, #{idPictureIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthCertificateIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{regId}, STAFF_ID_SEQ_NEXTVAL(), 'A' )

INSERT INTO NS_INSTRUCTOR( NATIONALITY, NAME, FULL_NAME, TEL_NO, ADDRESS, START_DATE, STORE_ID, PICTURE_IDX, CRIMINAL_RECORDS_IDX, RESUME_IDX, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{nationality}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{telNo}, #{address}, #{startDate}, #{storeId}, #{pictureIdx}, #{criminalRecordsIdx}, #{resumeIdx}, #{regId}, NOW() )
